channel.title: Speaches on SuRenPi
channel.description: Recent content in Speaches on SuRenPi

item.description: Title: The battle of CI/CD in Cloud Native Abstract: As a bridge between source codes and product value, CI/CD is playing a very important role. There’re many solutions was emerged. Some of them are an open source project, or some just provide the service. Jenkins has a great and very active open community, also has a long history. How does Jenkins could continuously keep a leader ship in the cloud native ecosystem?
